data.title: 5-star Hotel in Kuala Lumpur
data.meta_description: Sunway Putra Hotel Kuala Lumpur is a 5-star hotel located opposite WTC and near KLCC, offering comfortable rooms and facilities for a relaxing stay in the city.
data.text:
Situated directly opposite the World Trade Centre Kuala Lumpur, the 5-star Sunway Putra Hotel Kuala Lumpur is nestled in the heart of the diamond triangle, one of Kuala Lumpur’s most eclectic districts. Synonymous with vibrant street scenes, lined with local and trendy cafes and bars, bustling markets, landmarks, and a melting pot of Asian cultures and traditions, all of which can be easily explored.

The hotel presents a destination of fascinating contrasts, combining the charms of a private enclave with the energy of a dynamic city for an endless journey of discovery. The multiple award-winning Sunway Putra Hotel has been recognized as Kuala Lumpur’s Best City Hotel at the Luxury Lifestyle Awards 2024 and is also acknowledged among the top 3% of the best properties in Kuala Lumpur on Kayak.com at the 2024 KAYAK Travel Awards.

In addition to these honours, the hotel has also received the Tripadvisor® 2023 Travellers’ Choice® Award, emerging in the top 10% of hotels worldwide, the International Travel Awards 2023, where it was voted ‘Best Family Hotel 2023’, and The Edge Malaysia Best Managed & Sustainable Property Awards 2023, emerging as the winner in the 10 years & above Specialized category.

The 650-room hotel forms part of an integrated development and is directly linked to the multi-award-winning Sunway Putra Mall. Guests can uncover a host of retail and entertainment experiences, and it is also home to one of the largest dining options with over 80 renowned food and beverage outlets, specialty restaurants, and a lively food emporium atmosphere.

Strategically located at the confluence of several expressways and directly connected to the PWTC Light Rail Transport (LRT) station, guests have unrivalled accessibility and connectivity to hotspots like KL Sentral, Publika, Mont Kiara, and Bangsar. Kuala Lumpur city centre is less than three kilometers away from the hotel, where the iconic Petronas Twin Towers dominate the skyline, alongside other shopping, dining, and entertainment precincts. Another popular tourist destination, Genting Highlands, is only 48.7 kilometers (approximately 59 minutes) away via the Lebuhraya Kuala Lumpur - Gua Musang (E8).
